channel.title: Command Starter not working help me

item.title: Command Starter not working help me
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“oron, post:2, topic:251857”] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter")) && playerRights >=2) {

Your opening 2 brackets and closing 3 :S Try this:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("starter") && playerRights >=2) { [/quote]

By the way, those aren’t brackets. Those are parentheses. These are brackets: {

=P

Read full topic

item.title: Command Starter not working help me
item.dc:creator: @thepker13 thepker13
item.description:
@thepker13 wrote:

I put in the command called starter and compiled it to my server but in the compiler it said

client.java:10836: illegal start of type
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) && playerRights >=2 {
client.java:12741 (identifier) expected
};
^
2 errors
Press any key to continue…

Then after i press the key it said compile complete.
But after i tested it in my server it doesnt work!!! here is the code that i ahve in my client.java

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) && playerRights >=2) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 1500);
addItem(882, 5000);
addItem(839, 1);
addItem(1075, 1);
addItem(1087, 1);
addItem(1117, 1);
addItem(1115, 1);
addItem(1189, 1);
addItem(1321, 1);
addItem(1351, 1);
addItem(554, 10000);
addItem(555, 10000);
addItem(556, 10000);
addItem(557, 10000);
addItem(558, 10000);
addItem(559, 10000);
addItem(560, 10000);
addItem(561, 10000);
addItem(562, 10000);
addItem(563, 10000);
addItem(564, 10000);
addItem(565, 10000);
addItem(566, 10000);
sendMessage(“You recieved a Newcommer Package!!!”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry no more packages.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a cheater and is trying to get a new Package! :p");

        }
    }

CAn anyone help me please
